input.sentences: its nice to have a jam session outdoors at night .
get some people together and listen to some good music .
people enjoy a good drink with great tunes playing in the background .

output.sentences: The band decided to have an outdoors night session.
Some people came to listen to the music.
The band begin playing tunes for the people.
Some of the band members were playing the guitar and cello.
Most everyone was enjoying the atmosphere.
